name: Roy Tang
text: BL2 isn't really a "FPS skill" game, I'm not really that good at FPS aiming myself. The character abilities can compensate for lack of skill. The multiplayer is (normally) coop, and while adding a player increases the difficulty, it's worth it in terms of the additional manpower you get (more people to revive you when you're down) and the better loot
